The VX2252mh features ClearMotivâ¢ II technology that delivers 2ms ultra-fast response times for blur-free images during extreme gaming, and an ultra-high 50M:1 MEGA Dynamic Contrast Ratio for sharp, crisp color performance for enjoying movies.
